headline: UAW's Fain leads rally over Dearborn layoffs; manufacturer says it's done nothing wrong
summary: The UAW, upset with layoffs at Cleveland Cliffs, charged the company with violating a 2024 contract. The company said it's done nothing wrong.

raw.headline: UAW's Fain leads rally over Dearborn layoffs; manufacturer says it's done nothing wrong
raw.summary: The UAW, upset with layoffs at Cleveland Cliffs, charged the company with violating a 2024 contract. The company said it's done nothing wrong.

headline: ECD Automotive Strengthens Balance Sheet Through $10 Million Debt-for-Equity Exchange and Completes a $999,900 Equity Raise
summary: KISSIMMEE, Fla., Aug. 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ECD Automotive Design, Inc. (NASDAQ: ECDA) (“ECD” or the “Company”), the world’s largest Land Rover and Jaguar restoration company known for its custom luxury builds, including bespoke Defenders, Range Rovers, Jaguar E-Types, Ford Mustangs and Toyota FJs, announced that it has exchanged $10 million of outstanding convertible promissory notes for 15,000 newly issued shares of ECD’s Series C Convertible Preferred Stock. headline: FordDirect partners with Podium for AI-powered dealer conversations with customers
summary: Podium says its AI-powered solutions help dealerships and service providers respond instantly to inbound leads, automate follow-ups, and streamline communication across text, webchat, and social platforms.

headline: RBC Capital Lifts PT on Ford Motor Company (F) to $11 From $10
summary: Ford Motor Company (NYSE:F) is one of the best NYSE stocks to buy under $20. RBC Capital raised the firm’s price target on Ford Motor Company (NYSE:F) to $11 from $10 on August 4, keeping a Sector Perform rating on the shares.
